sourcesContent:
import MyInput from './Components/Input'
import MyButton from './Components/Button'
import { Container, Content, Row } from "./style";
import { useState } from 'react';

const App = () => {
 const [currentNumber, setCurrentNumber] = useState(0);
  return (
    <Container >
      <Content>
        <MyInput value={currentNumber}/>

        <Row>
          <MyButton label="x" />
          <MyButton label="/" />
          <MyButton label="C" />
          <MyButton label="X" />
        </Row>

        <Row>
          <MyButton label="7" />
          <MyButton label="8" />
          <MyButton label="9" />
          <MyButton label="-" />
        </Row>

        <Row>
          <MyButton label="4" />
          <MyButton label="5" />
          <MyButton label="6" />
          <MyButton label="+" />
        </Row>

        <Row>
          <MyButton label="1"/>
          <MyButton label="2" />
          <MyButton label="3" />
          <MyButton label="=" />
        </Row>
      </Content>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default App;
